understanding_complaint_process.title: Understanding BC Police Complaints Process
understanding_complaint_process.description: British Columbia has three oversight bodies: Office of the Police Complaint Commissioner (OPCC) for municipal police, Independent Investigations Office (IIO) for serious harm/death, and RCMP Civilian Review and Complaints Commission for RCMP.

file_complaint_iio.title: File with IIO (Serious Incidents)
file_complaint_iio.description: IIO investigates incidents involving police where death or serious harm occurred. They are automatically notified by police, but you can also report directly.

file_complaint_opcc.title: File with OPCC (Municipal Police)
file_complaint_opcc.description: Complaints about municipal police conduct, service delivery, or internal discipline matters.

contactInfo.address: Office of the Police Complaint Commissioner, 5th Floor, 947 Fort Street, Victoria, BC V8V 3K3

file_complaint_rcmp.title: File RCMP Complaint
file_complaint_rcmp.description: Complaints about RCMP officers must first go through RCMP internal process, then can be reviewed by Civilian Review and Complaints Commission.

understanding_child_protection.title: Understanding BC Child Protection System
understanding_child_protection.description: In BC, the Ministry of Children and Family Development oversees child protection. Delegated Aboriginal Agencies also provide services.

internal_complaint.title: File Internal Complaint with MCFD
internal_complaint.description: First step is to file a complaint directly with the Ministry of Children and Family Development office handling your case.

representative_children_youth.title: Contact Representative for Children and Youth
representative_children_youth.description: Independent office that can investigate child welfare concerns, conduct reviews, and advocate for improvements.
representative_children_youth.timeframe: After internal complaint or immediately if urgent

contactInfo.address: Representative for Children and Youth, PO Box 9207, Stn Prov Govt, Victoria, BC V8W 9J1

ombudsperson.title: File Complaint with BC Ombudsperson
ombudsperson.description: BC Ombudsperson investigates complaints about provincial government agencies including child protection services.
